attributes.action: Make the 2nd Monday of every month a National Public Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Simple. make the 2nd Monday of each month a national holiday whilst keeping the existing ones. 

Think of all those petitions that ask for St George's Day, St Valentine's Day, or even Commonwealth Day. You could just assign the nearest Monday to them. 

I beg to differ with anyone who will say that productivity would suffer as most people would be refreshed after having a three day weekend.
